mean_cn: n. 增补，补充物，保健品；  v. 补充
mean_en: a thing that is added to something else to improve or complete it; a pill that you take or a special kind of food that you eat in order to improve your health; a book or a section at the end of a book that gives extra information or deals with a special subject
sentence: You should take these herbal supplements once a day.
sentence_trans: 你应该一天服用一次这些草本保健品。
word_etyma: sup在下面，次要 + ple满，填满 + ment名词后缀 → 增加次要的心填满 → 增补
